content.title: DAPT Duration in Peripheral Interventions
content.description: Duration of dual antiplatelet therapy after peripheral vascular interventions

key_concepts.details: Typically aspirin alone or 1-3 months DAPT; less evidence-based than coronary
Generally 1-6 months DAPT; longer for drug-eluting stents; individualize by bleeding risk
Aspirin lifelong; role of DAPT less clear; may add clopidogrel for poor targets
Rivaroxaban 2.5mg BID + aspirin superior to aspirin alone for PAD patients

content.clinical_significance: Optimal duration remains uncertain; individualize based on ischemic/bleeding risk
